rules.name: myRule_11
rules.label: TTT Material Orders (Bulk and/or Invoice) Opportunity

Flow.description: This builder create a bulk order or an invoice to bill from. Specific for Canada, onsite, public and TTT material orders

value.stringValue: IF( CONTAINS( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , TRIM( MID( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet ), LEN( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet ) ) ) , "" )

formulas.name: formula_14_myRule_11_A1_8299228806
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS( {!myVariable_current.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet} , SUBSTITUTE( {!$Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder} , "-", "" ) ) , TRIM( MID( {!myVariable_current.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet} , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( {!$Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder} , "-", "" ) , {!myVariable_current.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet} ), LEN( {!myVariable_current.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet} ) ) ) , "" )

value.stringValue: IF( CONTAINS( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , LEFT( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet ) - 1 ) , [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet )

formulas.name: formula_15_myRule_11_A1_9945446237

value.stringValue: IF( CONTAINS( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , TRIM( MID( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet , FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet ), LEN( [Training_Event__c].Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet ) ) ) , "" )

Flow.label: Create Material/Invoice Order for Invoicing (Canada)
